Scripts.OnEnter: if not self:IsVisible() then return end GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_BOTTOMRIGHT") if self.isDebuff then GameTooltip:SetUnitDebuff(self:GetParent().unit, self:GetID()) else GameTooltip:SetUnitBuff(self:GetParent().unit, self:GetID()) end

Scripts.OnLoad: self:RegisterForClicks("AnyUp") KUnits_Initialize(self,"player", KUnits_playername, KUnits_playerhp, KUnits_playerhptext, KUnits_playerhptext2, KUnits_playerhpbg, KUnits_playermp, KUnits_playermptext, KUnits_playermpbg, KUnits_playerlevel, KUnits_playerhpperc) KUnits_player_OnLoad(self)

self:RegisterForClicks("AnyUp") KUnits_Initialize(self, "target", KUnits_targetname, KUnits_targethp, KUnits_targethptext, KUnits_targethptext2, KUnits_targethpbg, KUnits_targetmp, KUnits_targetmptext, KUnits_targetmpbg, KUnits_targetlevel, KUnits_targethpperc) KUnits_target_OnLoad(self)

self:RegisterForClicks("AnyUp") KUnits_Initialize(self, "pet", KUnits_petname, KUnits_pethp, KUnits_pethptext, KUnits_pethptext2, KUnits_pethpbg, KUnits_petmp, KUnits_petmptext, KUnits_petmpbg, KUnits_petlevel, KUnits_pethpperc) KUnits_pet_OnLoad(self)

self:RegisterForClicks("AnyUp") KUnits_Initialize(self, "focus", KUnits_focusname, KUnits_focushp, KUnits_focushptext, KUnits_focushptext2, KUnits_focushpbg, KUnits_focusmp, KUnits_focusmptext, KUnits_focusmpbg, KUnits_focuslevel, KUnits_focushpperc) KUnits_focus_OnLoad(self)

Scripts.OnMouseDown: if button == "LeftButton" and IsShiftKeyDown() then self:StartMoving() end
